channel.title: Requesting Auto Green Dragon Killer With Banker (paying when its working good)
channel.description:
Hej im looking for an auto green dragon killer. The autor need to walk himself to the greendragons and kill there green dragons till hes full and then bank the collected green dragon hides, bones and keeps repeating this action.
When its good and you can proof me its working with a vid or sumthing i can pay you in rs2 money

item.title: Requesting Auto Green Dragon Killer With Banker (paying when its working good)
item.dc:creator: @tryed_to_hack_it tryed to hack it
item.description:
@tryed_to_hack_it wrote:

heres on how to get one

1)D.L. SCAR 2.0.3 (only 2.03 has the script and dl means download
2)near the top left is a picture of a file with a globe, click that
3)a bunch of things will pop up, one sais auto fighter, click that
4)wait for it to load then a bunch of green (i think) writing will a apear on the SCAR screen
5) follow the directions it tells you, GOD speed!
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 04:53:34 PM[/size][hr]lol i said i couldn’t help!? sorry[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 04:54:15 PM[/size][hr]oh wait, i just read the new rules don’t pay me anything

sorry The UN-Named! and thanks

Read full topic
